question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. umbrella
B. dog
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The dog is in the foreground, partially obscuring the view of the pool and standing near the camera's perspective, while the umbrella is further back under a canopy, making its depth clearly more distant.
